name: Jane Wilde
description:
This all-new side-scrolling shooter game tests your ability to stay alive while killing as many undead creatures as possible.

Shoot, kick and bomb tons of twisted creatures, such as vampires, bats, skeletons, centaurs and many more!

“I was always pleasantly surprised at how much fun the game actually was.”
- Gamers association -

“The reliable controls make it easy to swipe between guns or press a button to switch quickly, and knowing when to whip out each one does wonders for diversifying gameplay.”
- Gamezone -

Get on board with this awesome Wild West pick-up and-play shooter!

Featuring:
• Five unique Wild West settings
• Over 30 levels of single player Story mode
• Five different stages in Survival mode
• Unlockable and upgradable weapons
• Special powers
• Dozens of monster types
• Boss fights
• Costumes
• Achievements
• Leaderboard

Note: Currently available in English only. More languages will be added soon.
